name: Bunny Quest
description:
Help desperate daddy bunny fix an Easter mess in the match3 game "Bunny Quest"! Help the cute Rabbit prepare the Easter dinner table for his host family. That sounds easy? His naughty little bunnies give their best to make this task the hardest imaginable... Have fun trying to trick these cute creatures and bring everything back in order before the family realizes their Easter arrangements are about to be ruined in this eggciting Match-3 game!

- Enjoy over 90 Match 3 levels
- Cute mini-games and witty trophies
- Choose elegant Easter dinner decorations
